message: Hey! I'm looking to "invest" in ideas or apps (web or mobile) - help with marketing & promo - etc - for a revshare. Anywhere from $1000 - $40,000 available depending on the project... If anyone is interested drop me a line with some info about your project - kieran@trackalyze.me
i'm working on a project right now, and we're about to start trying to actively court investors. just curious on some more details
what kind of revshare are you looking for? do you want stock too?

Revshare will be discussed on a case by case basis - really depends on what it is and how much money I'd be giving. Could be a simple agreement which says I get X% or if it's something high-end ($30-$40k) with an exit in mind, equity/stock.
I do, email me and I can pass it on... It's my personal FB, not really for biz so would rather not publicly share it.
do you have a facebook profile i could take a look at?
@kieran I sent you an email. Please shoot me any questions you have. Looking forward to your response.
Sending you email now.. Are you an Apple user?
cool, will hit you up via email
I sent you an email Kieran. Looking forward to your response.
I also sent an e-mail. If interested I'm happy to send you our deck.
I wish to email you, when can I contact you?
So no response? I'm guessing he might be busy already with some other business or really doesn't have the money to fund it.
